        Returns:
        whether the file has been deleted successfully
        See Also:

      • mergeFiles

        public static void mergeFiles(java.lang.String output,
                              java.lang.String... inputs)
        Merges the inputs file into a single output file by concatenate them.

        The merge operation doesn't read line per line, but instead transfers the byte content directly.

        Parameters:
        output - the output file
        inputs - the input files
        See Also:
        mergeFiles(File, File...)

      • mergeFiles

        public static void mergeFiles(java.io.File output,
                              java.io.File... inputs)
        Merges the inputs file into a single output file by concatenate them.

        The merge operation doesn't read line per line, but instead transfers the byte content directly.

        Parameters:
        output - the output file
        inputs - the input files
        See Also:
        mergeFiles(String, String...)
